CustomField.description: This formula field calculates the number of days between the Anticipated Run Date and Welcome Call fields
CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Anticipated_Run_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Anticipated_Run_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Welcome_Call__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Welcome_Call__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula field calculates the number of days between the Anticipated Run Date and Welcome Call fields
CustomField.label: Welcome Call Timeframe
